FuncDef: This command enables and configures the cflowd sampling behavior to collect traffic flow samples through a router for analysis.
CLIs: sampling { unicast | multicast } type { acl | interface } [ direction { ingress-only | egress-only | both } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the cflowd sampling type on the given virtual router interface. Values-acl - Specifies ACL cflowd analysis be applied to the given virtual router interface..

Specifies the direction of the cflowd analysis that is applied to the given virtual router interface. Values-ingress-only - Specifies an ingress only direction of the cflowd analysis be applied to the given virtual router interface..
